  1. # -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
  2. from django.db import models
  3. from django.utils.translation import ugettext_lazy as _
  4. from cms.models.managers import TitleManager
  5. from cms.models.pagemodel import Page
  6. from cms.utils.helpers import reversion_register
  7. from cms.utils import timezone
  10. class Title(models.Model):
  11. language = models.CharField(_("language"), max_length=15, db_index=True)
  12. title = models.CharField(_("title"), max_length=255)
  13. menu_title = models.CharField(_("title"), max_length=255, blank=True, null=True, help_text=_("overwrite the title in the menu"))
  14. slug = models.SlugField(_("slug"), max_length=255, db_index=True, unique=False)
  15. path = models.CharField(_("Path"), max_length=255, db_index=True)
  16. has_url_overwrite = models.BooleanField(_("has url overwrite"), default=False, db_index=True, editable=False)
  17. application_urls = models.CharField(_('application'), max_length=200, blank=True, null=True, db_index=True)
  18. redirect = models.CharField(_("redirect"), max_length=255, blank=True, null=True)
  19. meta_description = models.TextField(_("description"), max_length=255, blank=True, null=True)
  20. meta_keywords = models.CharField(_("keywords"), max_length=255, blank=True, null=True)
  21. page_title = models.CharField(_("title"), max_length=255, blank=True, null=True, help_text=_("overwrite the title (html title tag)"))
  22. page = models.ForeignKey(Page, verbose_name=_("page"), related_name="title_set")
  23. creation_date = models.DateTimeField(_("creation date"), editable=False, default=timezone.now)
  25. objects = TitleManager()
  27. class Meta:
  28. unique_together = (('language', 'page'),)
  29. app_label = 'cms'
  31. def __unicode__(self):
  32. return "%s (%s)" % (self.title, self.slug)
  34. def save(self, *args, **kwargs):
  35. # Update the path attribute before saving
  36. self.update_path()
  37. super(Title, self).save(*args, **kwargs)
  39. def update_path(self):
  40. # Build path from parent page's path and slug
  41. current_path = self.path
  42. parent_page = self.page.parent
  44. slug = u'%s' % self.slug
  45. if not self.has_url_overwrite:
  46. self.path = u'%s' % slug
  47. if parent_page:
  48. parent_title = Title.objects.get_title(parent_page, language=self.language, language_fallback=True)
  49. if parent_title:
  50. self.path = u'%s/%s' % (parent_title.path, slug)
  52. @property
  53. def overwrite_url(self):
  54. """Return overrwriten url, or None
  55. """
  56. if self.has_url_overwrite:
  57. return self.path
  58. return None
  61. class EmptyTitle(object):
  62. """Empty title object, can be returned from Page.get_title_obj() if required
  63. title object doesn't exists.
  64. """
  65. title = ""
  66. slug = ""
  67. path = ""
  68. meta_description = ""
  69. meta_keywords = ""
  70. redirect = ""
  71. has_url_overwite = False
  72. application_urls = ""
  73. menu_title = ""
  74. page_title = ""
  76. @property
  77. def overwrite_url(self):
  78. return None
  81. reversion_register(Title)
